extensionDescription.message: Provides a color- and size-based visual measurement of how spam-like an individual message is based on its normalized Rspamd score.

spamness.alertText.colonInHeaderName.message: The header you entered contains an invalid character, such as ':', a non-printable character, a non-ascii character, or an eight bit ascii character. Please remove the invalid character and try again.

spamness.alertText.destinationFolderAcco.message: Destination folder account is not set.

spamness.alertText.destinationFolderLoca.message: Destination folder location is not set.

spamness.alertText.error_2147500037_work.message: Try to display any message in the destination folder account first.

spamness.buttonTrainHam.tooltip.message: Move message to ham training folder

spamness.buttonTrainSpam.tooltip.message: Move message to spam training folder

spamnessColumnToolTip.label.message: Click to sort by Rspamd spam score

spamnessInstalled.columnInstructions.lab.message: To display the column in each folder, click the column picker and select the 'Spam score [Rspamd]' column, making sure it's checked and the new column is visible.  To apply it to all folders, click the column picker again, scrolling to the bottom to 'Apply columns to...', then 'Folder and its children...' and choose the top folder for your account.  The column has already been automatically added to the default columns set, but this doesn't affect existing folders.

spamnessInstalled.folderInstructions.lab.message: To re-index a folder, select it and choose 'Properties...' from the context or Edit menu, then click the 'Repair Folder' button.  You will need to do this for every folder.

spamnessInstalled.introduction.label.message: Thanks for installing Rspamd-spamness.  To use Rspamd-spamness, you'll need to both re-build folder indices for folders that contain Rspamd-scored mail and enable the 'Spam score' column display for each folder.  If you've installed Rspamd-spamness ahead of setting up any of your accounts, you can completely ignore the rest of this guide - you're all set.

spamnessOptions.prefDisplayColumnImageOn.message: Show visual only for positive score

spamnessOptions.prefHeaderName.explain.message: Note: Changing the headers Rspamd-spamness uses will require rebuilding all folder indices so Thunderbird can read the headers values for each message.  Open each folder's properties, then click the 'Repair Folder' button.

spamnessOptions.prefHeaderName.label.message: Additional mail headers to search for spam score in:

spamnessOptions.prefShowNLinesBeforeMore.message: Number of lines to show for rules header before 'more' (0 - unlimited)
